New Records: The Flames ended a long-standing jinx by securing a victory in a World Cup qualifier game against Liberia
Key Match Events: Chifundo Mphasi scored the only goal of the match at the 78th minute
Pre-Game Insights: The coach Patrick Mabedi commended the players for their excellent performance and noted the difficulty of winning in West Africa
Post-Match Reflections: The Flames are now third in Group H with three points, behind Tunisia and Equatorial Guinea
Miscellaneous Highlights: The team is set to host Tunisia on November 21, 2023, at the Bingu National Stadium in Lilongwe
